titleStmt.title: The Roman Catholick soldier's letter to Dr. Tho. Tenison
titleStmt.author: Ward, Thomas, 1652-1708.
Tenison, Thomas, 1636-1715.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to Thomas Ward. cf. NUC.
A response to Tenison's response to Ward's Defence of the Speculum.
